header.title: Domain verification
header.description: With the following process you proof control over your web domain. This verification process will require to include data to your TXT record of your web domain to you proof that you have control about the domain.

update-txt-record.title: Update your TXT record
update-txt-record.description: Update your domain's DNS settings. Copy the record provided below and paste it into the TXT record of your DNS settings as the value.

dns-record-verification.title: DNS record verification
dns-record-verification.description: Verification of the DNS TXT record for your domain is in progress. Due to DNS propagation, this may take a few minutes. Thank you for your understanding as the verification process concludes. You may close the process and leave this page.

errors.txt-record-creation: Could not create TXT record. Please try again later.
errors.txt-record-update: Could not confirm TXT record update. Please try again later.
